about.text1: I'm an aspiring Web-developer who loves to learn and try out new things. I value clean and responsive web applications above all. If the handling isn't enjoyable, then it's not a good experience. If you want to learn more about me or my projects, feel free to look around and drop me a message if you want to work with me or just talk about Webdev.
